description: Hopping into bed with Tomas Brand isn’t just sex -- it’s an experience, and it’s one Sergeant Miles has had on his gay-porn bucket list. The Lucas Entertainment production team was more than happy to accommodate him, as Sergeant Miles is a blast to watch on camera. This dude is no bullshit: when he fucks he’s instantly connected to his partner. At first I wondered which guy was more excited about this bareback sex hook-up -- Tomas Brand or Sergeant Miles -- but I eventually stopped guessing, as they’re both completely invested in one another. The sex between these two is hard to put into words; this is something you need to see to understand just how good it is -- it’s easily one of the best scenes of 2015 thus far. But allow me to point you in two directions, at least: check out 14:09 and 29:30. I’m not even going to hint what you’ll see, but you won’t be disappointed. Note: Sergeant Miles for the win when it comes to facial expressions in gay porn.
title: Tomas Brand And Sergeant Miles Work Up An Intense Sweat
